sentences: The Secretariat introduced documents on the work of the CGE and on financial and technical support ( FCCC/SBI/2007/10/Add.1 , FCCC/SBI/2007/MISC.7 , Adds.1-2, FCCC/CP/2008/2, and FCCC/SBI/2008/INF.10).
Emily Ojoo-Massawa (Kenya) and Ricardo Moita (Portugal) will co-chair a contact group.
